description:
The mafia organization responsible for Makimura`s death is back in Japan and their first move is getting rid of Umibozu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shijou Saikyou no Teki!! Ryou to Kaori no Last Match (Zenpen)
The Deadliest Enemy! Ryo`s and Kaori`s Final Match (Part One)
史上最強の敵!! 獠と香のラストマッチ (前編)
